revised_title: Observations on the Development of Semilunar Valves in Chick's Heart
tldr: The author investigates the development of semilunar valves in the chick's heart, providing new insights into the process of division of the truncus arteriosus and the formation of the aorta and pulmonary artery. The study offers valuable information that may shed light on congenital malformations of the heart.
